[Gender]               male;
[Desc]               <blue>James is a five-foot seven thirty-year-old guy, a programmer out of work by six months thanks to the state of the economy.  He's wearing a wrinkled office suit:  tan khakis, a white button-down shirt and tie, and brown leather shoes.  A bit pudgy at 180 pounds with curly blonde hair, he's a pretty average Joe--or in this case, James.  However, somehow or other he's managed to hook up with a sexy porn star named Kaylee who clearly holds him dear to her heart despite his ordinary looks and easily-flustered personality.  She sits in the front row of the audience smiling at him encouragingly and blowing kisses, helping him calm his nerves and put his mind to the game.  James will either win a nice sum of cash today, and if not... it looks as though his girlfriend may have plans for that event too...</blue>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>James--Jennie now, as the name on the podium states, is an entirely new person.  He--now undeniably a she--stands at a towering six foot four with long, toned hairless legs ending in seductively wide hips, an hourglass waist topped off by massive punpkin-sized natural breasts.  All she wears is a teeny tiny tan pair of pants and some tape on top of her nipples, her long black hair cascading down her astonishing figure.  Despite her siren-like beauty and height,  Jessie looks uncomfortable and begins to cry--at least until Kaylee leaps down from the audience and leaps into her arms.  She whispers a few words into her former boyfriend's ear.  You don't know what she says, but within seconds the tears trickling down Jessie's cheeks are replaced by passionate kissing, fondling, and giggling.  You're not at all surprised to learn a few weeks later that the duo have become quite a sensation in all the girly magazines.  It looks like the woman formerly known as James has entered quite a new form of career as a porn star, one that lets her spend every hour of it with the woman she loves.</pink>;
